item.title: Live updates: Pam Bondi to be sworn in as attorney general; other Trump nominees advancing
item.description: Get the latest news on President Donald Trump’s return to the White House and the new Congress.

item.title: Lawyer who backed Trump on Jan. 6 helped push birthright citizenship ban
Republicans in Congress quiet as Trump and Musk take the ax to federal agencies
Pam Bondi to be sworn in as attorney general following Senate confirmation
item.description: The 54-46 vote fell mostly along party lines, with Sen. John Fetterman (D-Pennsylvania) joining Republicans voting in her favor.

item.title: Analysis: Trump’s nominees gain momentum, but the drama is not over yet
